title: Workshops & Classes
text:
Welcome!
Welcome to the landing page for the various workshops and classes hosted by Dustin Haraden, PhD.
Workshops

1/17/2024 - AWARE AI: Data Analysis and Modeling in R

title: About
text:
About the Presenter
Hello!
My name is Dustin Haraden and I am an Assistant Professor of Psychology at Rochester Institute of Technology. The focus of my research is examining chronotype/circadian rhythms and sleep processes as risk factors for youth depression and anxiety. I also aim to further examine the impact of measurement upon the conclusions that can be made throughout psychological science.
I am also an advocate for open science practices and engaging in transparency throughout the research process.
Please reach out with any additional questions (send me an email).
